Changes.title: Archive System Overhaul
Changes.text: Characters and important characters now automatically archive when users leave the server and restore when they rejoin, keeping your lists clean and organized.

Changes.title: Smart Startup Audit
Changes.text: Bot now audits all entries on startup, archiving any that belong to users no longer in the server to maintain accurate character lists.

Changes.title: /restore Command
Changes.text: Admins can now manually restore archived entries through an intuitive select menu interface. Supports characters, important characters, and lore archives.

Changes.title: Dynamic List Updates
Changes.text: Character lists automatically refresh when entries are archived, restored, or when members join/leave - no manual updates needed.

Changes.title: Enhanced File Submissions
Changes.text: Submissions now support native Discord file uploads (JSON, TXT, PDF, DOCX) with automatic image extraction from DOCX files. Images are intelligently processed and uploaded to dedicated channels, with AI-powered appearance descriptions generated when needed. For submissions with images, DOCX format is recommended.

footer: This is now updated whenever I push a commit. A helpful change.
